00049 LocalBroker::LocalBroker(PropertiesPtr &props) : m_verbose(false) {
00050   const char *root;
00051 
00052   m_verbose = props->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose", false);
00053 
00057   if ((root = props->get("DfsBroker.Local.Root", 0)) == 0) {
00058     HT_ERROR("Required property 'DfsBroker.Local.Root' not specified, exiting...");
00059     exit(1);
00060   }
00061 
00062   m_rootdir = (root[0] == '/') ? root : System::install_dir + "/" + root;
00063 
00064   // strip off the trailing '/'
00065   if (root[strlen(root)-1] == '/')
00066     m_rootdir = m_rootdir.substr(0, m_rootdir.length()-1);
00067 
00068   // ensure that root directory exists
00069   if (!FileUtils::mkdirs(m_rootdir))
00070     exit(1);
00071 }

00082 void LocalBroker::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname, uint32_t bufsz) {
00083   int fd;
00084   String abspath;
00085 
00086   if (m_verbose) {
00087     HT_INFOF("open file='%s' bufsz=%d", fname, bufsz);
00088   }
00089 
00090   if (fname[0] == '/')
00091     abspath = m_rootdir + fname;
00092   else
00093     abspath = m_rootdir + "/" + fname;
00094 
00095   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_unique_id);
00096 
00100   if ((fd = ::open(abspath.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) == -1) {
00101     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00102     report_error(cb);
00103     return;
00104   }
00105 
00106   {
00107     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00108     OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataLocal(fd, O_RDONLY));
00109 
00110     cb->get_address(addr);
00111 
00112     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00113 
00114     cb->response(fd);
00115   }
00116 }

00122 void LocalBroker::create(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname, bool overwrite,
00123             uint32_t bufsz, uint16_t replication, uint64_t blksz) {
00124   int fd;
00125   int flags;
00126   String abspath;
00127 
00128   if (m_verbose) {
00129     HT_INFOF("create file='%s' overwrite=%d bufsz=%d replication=%d blksz=%d",
00130                 fname, (int)overwrite, bufsz, replication, blksz);
00131   }
00132 
00133   if (fname[0] == '/')
00134     abspath = m_rootdir + fname;
00135   else
00136     abspath = m_rootdir + "/" + fname;
00137 
00138   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_unique_id);
00139 
00140   if (overwrite)
00141     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC;
00142   else
00143     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_APPEND;
00144 
00148   if ((fd = ::open(abspath.c_str(), flags, 0644)) == -1) {
00149     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00150     report_error(cb);
00151     return;
00152   }
00153 
00154   {
00155     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00156     OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataLocal(fd, O_WRONLY));
00157 
00158     cb->get_address(addr);
00159 
00160     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00161 
00162     cb->response(fd);
00163   }
00164 }

00170 void LocalBroker::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00171   if (m_verbose) {
00172     HT_INFOF("close fd=%d", fd);
00173   }
00174   m_open_file_map.remove(fd);
00175   cb->response_ok();
00176 }

00182 void LocalBroker::read(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount) {
00183   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00184   ssize_t nread;
00185   uint64_t offset;
00186   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00187 
00188   if (m_verbose) {
00189     HT_INFOF("read fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00190   }
00191 
00192   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00193     char errbuf[32];
00194     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00195     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00196     return;
00197   }
00198 
00199   if ((offset = (uint64_t)lseek(fdata->fd, 0, SEEK_CUR)) == (uint64_t)-1) {
00200     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=0 SEEK_CUR - %s", fdata->fd, strerror(errno));
00201     report_error(cb);
00202     return;
00203   }
00204 
00205   if ((nread = FileUtils::read(fdata->fd, buf.base, amount)) == -1) {
00206     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount, strerror(errno));
00207     report_error(cb);
00208     return;
00209   }
00210 
00211   buf.size = nread;
00212 
00213   cb->response(offset, buf);
00214 }

00220 void LocalBroker::append(ResponseCallbackAppend *cb, uint32_t fd,
00221                          uint32_t amount, const void *data, bool sync) {
00222   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00223   ssize_t nwritten;
00224   uint64_t offset;
00225 
00226   if (m_verbose) {
00227     HT_INFOF("append fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00228   }
00229 
00230   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00231     char errbuf[32];
00232     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00233     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00234     return;
00235   }
00236 
00237   if ((offset = (uint64_t)lseek(fdata->fd, 0, SEEK_CUR)) == (uint64_t)-1) {
00238     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=0 SEEK_CUR - %s", fdata->fd, strerror(errno));
00239     report_error(cb);
00240     return;
00241   }
00242 
00243   if ((nwritten = FileUtils::write(fdata->fd, data, amount)) == -1) {
00244     HT_ERRORF("write failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount, strerror(errno));
00245     report_error(cb);
00246     return;
00247   }
00248 
00249   if (sync && fsync(fdata->fd) != 0) {
00250     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, strerror(errno));
00251     report_error(cb);
00252     return;
00253   }
00254 
00255   cb->response(offset, nwritten);
00256 
00257   return;
00258 }

00264 void LocalBroker::seek(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset) {
00265   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00266 
00267   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00268     char errbuf[32];
00269     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00270     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00271     return;
00272   }
00273 
00274   if ((offset = (uint64_t)lseek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET)) == (uint64_t)-1) {
00275     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd, offset, strerror(errno));
00276     report_error(cb);
00277     return;
00278   }
00279 
00280   cb->response_ok();
00281 }

00288   String abspath;
00289 
00290   if (m_verbose) {
00291     HT_INFOF("remove file='%s'", fname);
00292   }
00293 
00294   if (fname[0] == '/')
00295     abspath = m_rootdir + fname;
00296   else
00297     abspath = m_rootdir + "/" + fname;
00298 
00299   if (unlink(abspath.c_str()) == -1) {
00300     HT_ERRORF("unlink failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00301     report_error(cb);
00302     return;

00338 void LocalBroker::pread(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset, uint32_t amount) {
00339   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00340   ssize_t nread;
00341   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00342 
00343   if (m_verbose) {
00344     HT_INFOF("pread fd=%d offset=%lld amount=%d", fd, offset, amount);
00345   }
00346 
00347   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00348     char errbuf[32];
00349     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00350     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00351     return;
00352   }
00353 
00354   if ((nread = FileUtils::pread(fdata->fd, buf.base, amount, (off_t)offset)) == -1) {
00355     HT_ERRORF("pread failed: fd=%d amount=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd, amount, offset, strerror(errno));
00356     report_error(cb);
00357     return;
00358   }
00359 
00360   buf.size = nread;
00361 
00362   cb->response(offset, buf);
00363 }

00375 
00376   if (dname[0] == '/')
00377     absdir = m_rootdir + dname;
00378   else
00379     absdir = m_rootdir + "/" + dname;
00380 
00381   if (!FileUtils::mkdirs(absdir)) {
00382     HT_ERRORF("mkdirs failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00383     report_error(cb);
00384     return;
00385   }
00386 
00387   cb->response_ok();

00409     HT_ERRORF("%s failed.", cmd_str.c_str());

00428 void LocalBroker::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, const char *dname) {
00429   std::vector<String> listing;
00430 
00431   int Readdir(const char *pathname, std::vector<String> &result);
00432 
00433 
00434   String absdir;
00435 
00436   if (m_verbose) {
00437     HT_INFOF("Readdir dir='%s'", dname);
00438     std::cout << std::flush;
00439   }
00440 
00441   if (dname[0] == '/')
00442     absdir = m_rootdir + dname;
00443   else
00444     absdir = m_rootdir + "/" + dname;
00445 
00446   DIR *dirp = opendir(absdir.c_str());
00447   if (dirp == 0) {
00448     HT_ERRORF("opendir('%s') failed - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00449     report_error(cb);
00450     return;
00451   }
00452 
00453   struct dirent dent;
00454   struct dirent *dp;
00455 
00456   if (readdir_r(dirp, &dent, &dp) != 0) {
00457     HT_ERRORF("readdir('%s') failed - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00458     (void)closedir(dirp);
00459     report_error(cb);
00460     return;
00461   }
00462 
00463   while (dp != 0) {
00464 
00465     if (dp->d_name[0] != '.' && dp->d_name[0] != 0)
00466       listing.push_back((String)dp->d_name);
00467 
00468     if (readdir_r(dirp, &dent, &dp) != 0) {
00469       HT_ERRORF("readdir('%s') failed - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00470       report_error(cb);
00471       return;
00472     }
00473   }
00474   (void)closedir(dirp);
00475 
00476   HT_INFOF("Sending back %d listings", listing.size());
00477   std::cout << std::flush;
00478 
00479   cb->response(listing);
00480 }

00486 void LocalBroker::flush(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00487   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00488 
00489   if (m_verbose) {
00490     HT_INFOF("flush fd=%d", fd);
00491   }
00492 
00493   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00494     char errbuf[32];
00495     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00496     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00497     return;
00498   }
00499 
00500   if (fsync(fdata->fd) != 0) {
00501     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, strerror(errno));
00502     report_error(cb);
00503     return;
00504   }
00505 
00506   cb->response_ok();
00507 }

00519 void LocalBroker::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00520   m_open_file_map.remove_all();
00521   cb->response_ok();
00522   poll(0, 0, 2000);
00523 }

00542 void
00543 LocalBroker::rename(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *src, const char *dst) {
00544   String asrc =
00545     format("%s%s%s", m_rootdir.c_str(), *src == '/' ? "" : "/", src);
00546   String adst =
00547     format("%s%s%s", m_rootdir.c_str(), *dst == '/' ? "" : "/", dst);
00548 
00549   if (m_verbose)
00550     HT_INFOF("rename %s -> %s", asrc.c_str(), adst.c_str());
00551 
00552   if (std::rename(asrc.c_str(), adst.c_str()) != 0) {
00553     report_error(cb);
00554     return;
00555   }
00556   cb->response_ok();
00557 }

00559 
00563 void LocalBroker::report_error(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00564   char errbuf[128];
00565   errbuf[0] = 0;
00566   strerror_r(errno, errbuf, 128);
00567   if (errno == ENOTDIR || errno == ENAMETOOLONG || errno == ENOENT)
00568     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILENAME, errbuf);
00569   else if (errno == EACCES || errno == EPERM)
00570     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_PERMISSION_DENIED, errbuf);
00571   else if (errno == EBADF)
00572     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00573   else if (errno == EINVAL)
00574     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_INVALID_ARGUMENT, errbuf);
00575   else
00576     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, errbuf);
00577 }
